content: **combo deals buy 3 or more patterns & receive 20% off coupon code save20% buy 5 or more patterns & receive 30% off coupon code save30% buy 10 or more patterns & receive 40% off coupon code save40%** **find the matching sandals pattern here ** http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/trekkers-baby-boy-sandals 1 the pattern includes sizes from newborn to 10 years and is in standard american terms the hats are worked using worsted weight yarn size 4 medium and hook g 4 25mm for size 6-12 months and hook h 5mm for all the other sizes the bands use hook f for 0-3 months and g for all the other sizes the hat is quick to work up with an h hook 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/trekkers-baby-boy-sandals
